Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2009 04:25PM queenb wrote: October 15 Hi Binney4 Thank you for your reply. It was very helpful to me. I also went on website you posted about truncal lymphedema. I will let you know how I make out.The information you gave me made me feel better. Thanks again.
Posts.Title: Breast swelling - post radiation queenb queenb

Posts.Content: queenb wrote: I had a left breast lumpectomy at the end of May. I went through 7 weeks of radiation in which I finished around the 20th of August. Towards the end of September I developed swelling of the left breast. Has anyone had a similiar experience and what if anything did you do about it. I have made an appt to see my doctor within a week. Thanks in advance for your replies. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast swelling - post radiation queenb queenb
